definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: The water in bathroom need to be boiled for drinking.
sentences.chinese: 衛生間內的水要燒開後才能飲用。

sentences.english: Pour the water into a pan and bring it to boil.
Pour in water and Knorr fix. Stir to combine and bring to boil.
sentences.chinese: 然後倒入水和調味包拌勻後燒開。

sentences.english: The water which comes to a boil does not give the best taste.
sentences.chinese: 水是來燒開沒有獲患上最好的滋味兒。

sentences.english: Prepare bottle individually. Pour in cooled boiled water.
sentences.chinese: 準備好奶瓶，注入放涼些的燒開過的水。

sentences.english: One day he noticed some leaves had fallen into his boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他發現一些葉子掉進了他燒開的水中。

sentences.english: Boil water in small pot, turn off fire, add oolong tea leaves.
sentences.chinese: 在壺中將水燒開，關火，加入茶葉。

sentences.english: Bring the mixture to a boil, cover, then reduce the heat to maintain a simmer. Cook for 2 hours.
sentences.chinese: 鍋燒開，蓋上蓋子，調到小火繼續燉2個小時。

sentences.english: Boiling is always a good way of treating water.
sentences.chinese: 燒開一直是水處理的一種好辦法。

sentences.english: It takes only ten minutes to boil water in this electric kettle .
sentences.chinese: 用這個電水壺十分鐘就可以把水燒開。

sentences.english: Stir over a low heat to dissolve the sugar, then bring gently to the boil .
sentences.chinese: 低溫將糖溶化，然後慢慢燒開。

sentences.english: Boil a pot of water with a bunch of candles.
sentences.chinese: 用一把蠟燭燒開一壺水。

sentences.english: Out of his nostrils goeth smoke, as out of a seething pot or caldron.
sentences.chinese: 20從牠鼻孔冒出煙來，如燒開的鍋和點著的蘆葦。

sentences.english: If the fire has been turned off from time to time before the water boils, the water is always unboiled water.
sentences.chinese: 如果還沒燒開就反覆燒燒停停，這壺水永遠是生水。

sentences.english: Put the creamy soup, cabbages and spices, boil them, skin away the froth.
sentences.chinese: 湯鍋放奶湯，放白菜小料燒開，撇去沫。

definition: raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
